title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Apr 22 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Apr 22 2022
description:
Radical teachers union kingpin Randi Weingarten on Florida pushing back against the woke movement and standing for parents’ rights: This is the way in which wars start. This is the way in which hatred starts. Winner of Lie of the Year, former President Obama points finger at tech companies for disinformation. Stephen Miller, former senior adviser to President Trump and the president of America First Legal, joins Clay and Buck to discuss the flood of illegal immigration and the Biden administration's poor response. Biden dumps tons of CO2 gas to fly across the nation to Seattle to whisper about windmills. This could have been a Zoom call. Is Biden mentally capable of running for reelection in 2024?

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
